tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE 5g_edge_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE latency_metrics (
    latency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES 5g_edge_devices(device_id),
    latency_value DOUBLE PRECISION,
    latency_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES 5g_edge_devices(device_id),
    message TEXT,
    message_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE processing_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES 5g_edge_devices(device_id),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(20)
)
